page.title: 03PARWICH PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school has 11 rooms, but only two of them are classrooms. My classrtoom is the junior room. It is a bit bigger than the infant class. The infants teacher is Mrs. Birch and our headteacher is called Mr. Williams. He teaches 1st and 2nd years and the 3rd and 4th years are taught by Mrs. Davison. The infants teacher, Mrs. Birch, has to teach 23 children and she has been teaching at the school for 28 years. The new room was built 5 years ago. It's a little room with space for 9 adults or l8 children. There is a small cooking kitchen with two cupboards at the end. In one is the food and in the other is the hardware. The other rooms are toilets, porches and stockrooms. There are two playgrounds and a lawn.
